data.comment: The first-half is just kicking off.
Free kick for Benevento in the half of Juventus.
In the minute 4, Fabrizio Pasqua signals a free kick to Juventus.
Throw-in for Juventus in the half of Benevento.
Paulo Dybala (Juventus) gets in a strike but the shot is blocked by a defender.
In the minute 7, Can Juventus get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in Benevento's half?
Benevento have a dangerous throw-in.
Benevento are in shooting range from this free kick.
In the minute 10, It's a goal kick for the away team in Benevento.
Benevento's Gaetano Letizia is on target but unsuccessful.
Benevento have been awarded a corner by Fabrizio Pasqua.
In the minute 12, Corner awarded to Benevento.
Benevento attack but Luca Caldirola's header doesn't find the target.
Goal kick for Juventus at Stadio Ciro Vigorito.
In the minute 13, Juventus to take a throw-in in Benevento territory.
Juventus pushes forward through Aaron Ramsey, whose finish on goal is saved.
Fabrizio Pasqua awards the home team a throw-in.
In the minute 14, Fabrizio Pasqua signals a free kick to Benevento in their own half.
Fabrizio Pasqua blows against Benevento's Gianluca Lapadula for offside.
Fabrizio Pasqua awards Benevento a goal kick.
In the minute 16, Free kick Juventus.
Juventus drive forward but Alvaro Morata is judged offside.
A throw-in for the away team on the opposite half.
In the minute 18, Fabrizio Pasqua signals a Juventus throw-in in Benevento's half.
Juventus needs to be cautious. Benevento have an attacking throw-in.
Goal! Alvaro Morata gives Juventus a 0-1 lead in Benevento.
In the minute 21, Federico Chiesa with an assist there.
Throw-in Benevento.
Adrien Rabiot for Juventus is whistled offside.
In the minute 24, Federico Chiesa of Juventus smashes in a shot on target. The keeper saves, though.
In Benevento a free kick has been awarded the home team.
Juventus are coming forward and Paulo Dybala gets in a strike, it misses the target, however.
In the minute 26, Ball goes out of play for a Benevento goal kick.
In Benevento Benevento drive forward through Riccardo Improta. His shot is on target but it's saved.
Ball safe as Benevento is awarded a throw-in in their half.
In the minute 30, Corner awarded to Benevento.
Juventus's Aaron Ramsey gets in a shot on goal at Stadio Ciro Vigorito. But the effort is unsuccessful.
Luca Caldirola is down and play has been interrupted for a few moments.
Juventus have been awarded a corner by Fabrizio Pasqua.
In the minute 33, Luca Caldirola, who was grimacing earlier, has been substituted. Christian Maggio is the substitute for Benevento.
In Benevento, Benevento push forward quickly but are pulled up for offside.
In the minute 36, Gianluca Lapadula's header is off-target for Benevento.
Juventus have a goal kick.
Juventus have been awarded a corner by Fabrizio Pasqua.
In the minute 37, Juventus's Paulo Dybala has run offside.
The match at Stadio Ciro Vigorito has been interrupted briefly for a check on Federico Chiesa, who is down injured.
Federico Chiesa has recovered and rejoins the match in Benevento.
In the minute 42, Benevento drives forward and Gaetano Letizia gets in a shot. Without netting, however.
Throw-in for Juventus in the half of Benevento.
Benevento will need to be alert as they defend a dangerous free kick from Juventus.
In the minute 45, Juventus's Paulo Dybala gets his shot away but it misses the target.
Fabrizio Pasqua awards Benevento a goal kick.
3 minutes of injury time will be added to the 1st half.
In the minute 45, Corner awarded to Juventus.
Corner awarded to Benevento.
Pasquale Schiattarella gets his shot on target but fails to score for Benevento.
In the minute 45, Benevento have been awarded a corner by Fabrizio Pasqua.
Fabrizio Pasqua blows to end the first-half.
Goal! Gaetano Letizia levels the match at 1-1.
In the minute 46, The second-half is underway at Stadio Ciro Vigorito.
Fabrizio Pasqua signals a Juventus throw-in in Benevento's half.
Benevento awarded a free kick in their own half.
In the minute 47, It's a goal kick for the away team in Benevento.
Riccardo Improta of Benevento gets in a strike, but is off target.
Goal kick for Juventus at Stadio Ciro Vigorito.
In the minute 49, Alvaro Morata of Juventus is pulled up for offside.
Juventus have been awarded a corner by Fabrizio Pasqua.
In Benevento, Alvaro Morata (Juventus) misses the target with a header.
In the minute 52, Benevento have a goal kick.
Juventus are pushing forward but Paulo Dybala's finish is wide of the goal.
Ball goes out of play for a Benevento goal kick.
In the minute 54, Ball goes out of play for a Benevento goal kick.
Can Juventus get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in Benevento's half?
Fabrizio Pasqua waits before resuming play because Pasquale Schiattarella for Benevento is still down.
In the minute 58, Goal kick for Benevento at Stadio Ciro Vigorito.
Benevento's Pasquale Schiattarella is back in action after a slight knock.
Free kick for Juventus in their own half.
In the minute 59, Christian Maggio (Benevento) has received a yellow card from Fabrizio Pasqua.
Alvaro Morata (Juventus) is first to the ball but his header is off-target.
In the minute 60, It's a goal kick for the home team in Benevento.
Roberto Insigne is on a sub for Christian Maggio for Benevento.
Benevento awarded a free kick in their own half.
Juventus's Alvaro Morata misses with an attempt on goal.
In the minute 62, Fabrizio Pasqua awards Benevento a goal kick.
In the minute 62, Juventus to take a throw-in in Benevento territory.
Rodrigo Bentancur is replacing Arthur for the away team.
Dejan Kulusevski is replacing Aaron Ramsey for Juventus at Stadio Ciro Vigorito.
Free kick Juventus.
Corner awarded to Juventus.
In the minute 64, In Benevento a free kick has been awarded the home team.
Benevento have a goal kick.
Throw-in for Benevento in their own half.
In the minute 66, Goal kick for Benevento at Stadio Ciro Vigorito.
Can Benevento capitalize from this throw-in deep inside Juventus's half?
In the minute 69, Throw-in for Benevento at Stadio Ciro Vigorito.
Andrea Pirlo is making the team's third substitution at Stadio Ciro Vigorito with Federico Bernardeschi replacing Federico Chiesa.
Play has been temporarily suspended for attention to Artur Ionita for Benevento who is writhing in pain on the pitch.
Artur Ionita (Benevento) does not seem to be able to continue. He is replaced by Andres Tello.
Corner awarded to Juventus.
In the minute 72, Juventus have been awarded a corner by Fabrizio Pasqua.
In the minute 72, The home team have replaced Gianluca Lapadula with Marco Sau. This is the fourth substitution made today by Filippo Inzaghi.
The home team replace Gianluca Caprari with Alessandro Tuia.
Free kick for Benevento in their own half.
Fabrizio Pasqua signals a free kick to Juventus in their own half.
In the minute 76, It's a goal kick for the home team in Benevento.
A throw-in for the home team on the opposite half.
Fabrizio Pasqua signals a free kick to Juventus in their own half.
In the minute 78, Benevento awarded a free kick in their own half.
Fabrizio Pasqua signals a free kick to Juventus.
In the minute 80, Fabrizio Pasqua signals a Juventus throw-in in Benevento's half.
Juan Cuadrado (Juventus) has been booked and must now be careful not to get a second yellow card.
Free kick for Juventus in the half of Benevento.
Pasquale Schiattarella for Benevento has been booked by Fabrizio Pasqua and will miss the next match due to a suspension.
In the minute 83, A throw-in for the away team on the opposite half.
Benevento awarded a throw-in in their own half.
Free kick for Benevento in their own half.
Paulo Dybala for Juventus drives towards goal at Stadio Ciro Vigorito. But the finish is unsuccessful.
Juventus have been awarded a corner by Fabrizio Pasqua.
In the minute 86, Benevento have a goal kick.
In the minute 86, At Stadio Ciro Vigorito, Kamil Glik has been yellow-carded for the home team.
In Benevento Juventus's Federico Bernardeschi is caught offside.
Free kick for Juventus in their own half.
In the minute 89, Benevento to take a throw-in in Juventus territory.
Fabrizio Pasqua signals a free kick to Benevento in their own half.
6 minutes will be added to the 2nd half.
Free kick for Juventus in the half of Benevento.
Dejan Kulusevski of Juventus smashes in a shot on target. The keeper saves, though.
Fabrizio Pasqua awards Benevento a goal kick.
Can Juventus capitalize from this dangerous free kick?
Free kick Juventus.
Full-time! The final score is 1-1.
Riccardo Improta for Benevento has been booked by Fabrizio Pasqua and receives a first yellow card.
